    - Opens the add appointment form.

    - Turns off date filtering on the appointments tab, displays all appointments.
    void
    aDeleteAppointmentPressed()
    - Deletes the selected appointment.
    void
    aLogOutButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    - Closes the current window and takes the user back to the login form.
    void
    aModifyAppointmentPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    - Opens the selected appointment in modify appointment form.
    void
    aMonthRadioPressed()
    - Turns on filtering by month on the appointments tab.
    void
    aNextButtonPressed()
    - Increments the pageNum value to change the date range being filtered into the future.
    void
    aPrevButtonPressed()
    - Decrements the pageNum value to change the date range being filtered into the past.

    - Turns on filtering by week on the appointments tab.

    javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments>
    filterAppointments(int selector, int pageNum)
     
    void
    initialize()
    - Runs when the window opens, initializes all data for the program, including tableviews, buttons, and reports.
    void
    rByDivisionCountryComboPressed()
    - Uses the selected country to display the relevant divisions in rByDivisionDivisionComboPressed() method.
    void
    rByDivisionDivisionComboPressed()
    - Gets the total number of customers in a selected division and displays it in the GUI if a country has also been selected.
    void
    rByMonthMonthComboPressed()
    - Gets the selected type and displays the total appointments by type and month if the month combo also has a selection.
    void
    rByMonthTypeComboPressed()
    - Gets the selected month and displays the total appointments by type and month if the type combo also has a selection.
    void
    rCustomerComboPressed()
    - Finds the total number of appointments for a selected customer and displays it in the GUI.
    void
    rScheduleComboPressed()
    - Displays all appointments for the selected contact in the schedule table.
    boolean
    setHasUpcomingAppointment()
    - Checks if there is an upcoming appointment, then displays it in the upcoming appointments box - This was placed in its own method instead of initialize() so it can be called whenever the appointments change, as opposed to only when the window opens.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()

    • aNextButtonPressed

      public void aNextButtonPressed()
      - Increments the pageNum value to change the date range being filtered into the future.

    • aPrevButtonPressed

      public void aPrevButtonPressed()
      - Decrements the pageNum value to change the date range being filtered into the past.

    • aLogOutButtonPressed

      public void aLogOutButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      - Closes the current window and takes the user back to the login form.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • aAllRadioPressed

      public void aAllRadioPressed()
      - Turns off date filtering on the appointments tab, displays all appointments.

    • aMonthRadioPressed

      public void aMonthRadioPressed()
      - Turns on filtering by month on the appointments tab.

    • aWeekRadioPressed

      public void aWeekRadioPressed()
      - Turns on filtering by week on the appointments tab.

    • filterAppointments

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> filterAppointments(int selector, int pageNum)
      Parameters:
      selector - - The type of filtering to be performed (1 = MONTH, 2 = WEEK)
      pageNum - - The date range being displayed, pageNum = 1 displays the week or month the current date falls in.
      Returns:
      - An observableList of all appointments falling within the chosen date range.

    • aAddAppointmentPressed

      IOException

    • cRefreshPressed

      public void cRefreshPressed()
      - Refreshes the customer table with a fresh connection to the database.

    • setHasUpcomingAppointment

      public boolean setHasUpcomingAppointment()
      - Checks if there is an upcoming appointment, then displays it in the upcoming appointments box - This was placed in its own method instead of initialize() so it can be called whenever the appointments change, as opposed to only when the window opens.

    • rCustomerComboPressed

      public void rCustomerComboPressed()
      - Finds the total number of appointments for a selected customer and displays it in the GUI.

    • rByMonthTypeComboPressed

      public void rByMonthTypeComboPressed()
      - Gets the selected month and displays the total appointments by type and month if the type combo also has a selection.

    • rByMonthMonthComboPressed

      public void rByMonthMonthComboPressed()
      - Gets the selected type and displays the total appointments by type and month if the month combo also has a selection.

    • rByDivisionDivisionComboPressed

      public void rByDivisionDivisionComboPressed()
      - Gets the total number of customers in a selected division and displays it in the GUI if a country has also been selected.

    • rByDivisionCountryComboPressed

      public void rByDivisionCountryComboPressed()
      - Uses the selected country to display the relevant divisions in rByDivisionDivisionComboPressed() method.

    • rScheduleComboPressed

      public void rScheduleComboPressed()
      - Displays all appointments for the selected contact in the schedule table.
